RELEASE NOTE:

Marco Torrance presents his debut album
Reconstructed Moments, right here on Cardamar
Music. This album contains nine tracks about
things and thoughts which came along with Marco in
the past ten years.

Marco also got some assistance by 2 great
musicians. The guitar was played by Volker
Kaufmann who is one half of Germanys Easy
Listening duo Shaped Signs. The voice and the
lyrics on the final track Behind Closed Eyes
were made by Michelle Richer, a vocalist, musician
and philosopher from Washington D.C.

Finally, its emotional and epic chillout kissed
by trancy sounds, a guitar partly and the
wonderful voice of Michelle Riche.
